articles.title: U.S. takes steps to prepare for pandemic as global coronavirus cases rise - NBC News
articles.description: How many people in the U.S. have coronavirus? The CDC says at least 34 patients have been diagnosed with coronavirus in the U.S. since the outbreak began.
articles.content:
As global concerns over the coronavirus outbreak grow, the U.S. is taking steps to prepare for the possibility of a pandemic, the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention said Friday.
